item.title: Sarah Jeffery - Queen of Mean
item.description:
Queen of Mean from Descendants 3. It’s been raised by 2 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along. It’s just the first part of the song, and it is abruptly cut off at the key change. For educational use. Chords Used: Am F G Dm
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: The Kiboomers - Columbus Day
item.description:
For educational use. Chords Used: F & C
Columbus Day by The Kiboomers! Integrate history / social studies / core subjects into your music class. It’s been raised by 1 semitone so beginner ukulele students can play along. Their original video may be found here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-yzzCYJDPrQ .
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Pinkfong - Baby Shark 1.5x
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of G. Modified to keep the entire song in G (No key change).
As performed by Pink Fong
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of F. Modified to remain in one key.

item.title: Tumble Tots - Elephants Have Wrinkles
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Cm.
As performed by Tumble Tots.
Tonight as we were driving back from seeing Incredibles 2, my six year old (fresh out of kindergarten) asked, “Can we sing ‘Elephants Have Wrinkles?’” So...I did as most fathers would do...I opened Apple Music and we listened to it...five times. Then my son asked if I would make a play along of this song...so I did.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: The Kiboomers - Ten in the Bed / Roll Over
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Ten In A Bed on the ukulele by The Kiboomers. The chord used is C. (Original in D)
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: The Learning Station - Herman the Worm
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of G. The original is in A, but I lowered it a whole step as so many elementary programs feature four chords (which does not include A).
As performed by The Learning Station.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
The colored font matches Aquila KIDS and DR Multi-Color ukulele strings.
This version matches the educational Color Chord approach and uses four chords: C (red sticker), G (green stickers), F (yellow stickers) and Am (blue sticker).
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Sesame Street - Bein' Green
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C.
This is not the easiest song. Raised up from the original Key of Bb, and slowed down to about 80% of the original key.
This is an edited video...I had originally forgot to add the list of chords in the song.
Need to practice at a different tempo? Use the gear icon in the video (lower right) to slow down (or speed up) the tempo at pitch! Need to do so on an iPad or iPhone? Check out the browser called "iCab Mobile" which has a Module called "Video Playback Rate"
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Poppy Friar - The Little Einsteins™ Theme Song UK Version
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Keys of A and C
There is a key change in the middle that is an E Major Scale...an E Major Scale can be played instead of stopping and waiting for the new key.
Need to practice at a different tempo? Use the gear icon in the video (lower right) to slow down (or speed up) the tempo at pitch! Need to do so on an iPad or iPhone? Check out the browser called "iCab Mobile" which has a Module called "Video Playback Rate"
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
